About Me

Hello, my name is Oliver Roy, and I’m an Azure-focused IT professional with a strong foundation in Microsoft Azure administration, cloud infrastructure, and security fundamentals. I hold Microsoft Azure certifications including Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900), Azure Administrator Associate (AZ-104), and Azure Solutions Architect Expert (AZ-305). Through structured learning, hands-on labs, and applied skills training, I’ve developed practical experience working with Azure resources, identity and access management, networking, and security-aware cloud configurations. Alongside my technical development, I bring a strong background in customer service and technical support, where clear communication, structured troubleshooting, and reliability are essential. This combination allows me to effectively support users, follow documented procedures, and contribute to stable and secure cloud environments. I am particularly interested in cloud support, cloud operations, and junior cloud engineering roles, where I can apply my current skills while continuing to grow under experienced teams. I enjoy working with Azure technologies, solving technical problems methodically, and continuously improving my knowledge of cloud computing.

Thank you for taking the time to visit my portfolio.

Oliver L. Roy

Microsoft Azure Certified Professional.
